Key:
Go on a date with Spirits and stabilize their power?
Damn it, Kotori. You make it sound so easy.
Before I do that, I need to figure out something...

So many things have been happening in the
last couple of days. I need to get it together...

I wonder if there's somewhere I can go
to gather my thoughts. Oh, what about...?

Phew... The wind feels so good. The view is great,
this is such a calming place to be.
Hm? I thought I was alone...

Oh... you don't need to be afraid. I wanted to be
alone, but if it's just you guys, I can appreciate the
company.
I wonder if they'd want any bread.
Here you go.

How's that? Sorry they're just scraps.
Do they at least taste good?
Oh, they ate it. Want some more?
There, there. Go on, have some more.
Huh?

Haha, there are more! Wait... isn't this
kind of a bit too much?!

Y-You guys... come on, give me some personal
space here. Hey?! Hey, get away! Whoa!
T-That was pretty clumsy...
Hehe...
Hm? Is... someone there?
K-Kurumi?!
Good afternoon, Shido-san.
Y-You...
My, you look so terrified.
W-What are you doing here?!
At ease. No need to be so alarmed.

How can I not be?! Don't think I forget what you
did! It was just the other day...

Hehe, really, don't be so worried. I don't plan on doing
anything with you at the moment, Shido-san...
Are you sure?
Of course. Because―

Shido-san, you're empty right now.
You don't look delicious at all.
I have no plans of eating you today, Shido-san.

Today, huh? What are you doing at the school?
Besides... don't tell me you plan on coming
back to class...
No... There was something that drew my interest.
What do you mean by that?
Hehe. That's my business. Don't mind me.
Anyway, Shido-san... you like pigeons?
Excuse me?
You sure are friendly with them.
Kurumi, are you being sarcastic?

No, you really looked like it.
Anyone would think the same thing.

I wasn't trying to be friendly. They were
poking at me.
Hehe. That just means they like you, right?

Animals don't lie. They'd never approach
someone they didn't like.

Lying's not the right word. They just
live according to their instincts.
Is that bad?

To say you like what you like and hate what you
hate... I think that's a good way to live.
I guess when you put it like that, it's alright, but...
Right? That's what I like about you, Shido-san.
What?! Y-You know what...
Oh, are you embarrassed?
That's not the point. Back on topic...
Sure.

Living only according to your instincts might make
you cross a line you're not supposed to. That can
be very troubling, right?
Are you talking about humans?
No, not only that.

Humans have already crossed a line they shouldn't have
long ago. Look how they're killing animals to their liking.
And it's not just to survive, but for fun...
W-Well...

How are they and humans so different? Humans try
to appear nobly, but animals have lives too.
*grunt*...

(Kurumi is right. Everyone only gets one life and no
single creature has a right to take it away from another.)

Wouldn't you say humans are truly selfish?
They always think they're above others.

(There really are humans like that.
That's not all of us though...)

Hehehe... I guess there's no point is saying
this to you Shido-san. However...
However... what?

Maybe that's more of a reason why someone like
me was born into the world. I'm an archenemy of humans.

(So this is what Kurumi is getting at. Just like humans
are following a natural order in killing animals...
Spirits are killing humans in the same way.)

Oh my. Would you look at the time? I enjoyed this
conversation with you so much that I stayed here
much longer than I should've. I must go now.
You really don't plan on doing anything, right?

Right. I will be quiet for a little while. Trust me.
Rather, I think you should be focusing on your
own situation, Shido-san.
W-What?
I don't sense animosity. Trust Kurumi.
She's gotta be hiding something. Don't trust Kurumi.
I guess I'll trust you for now.
That is lovely.
I don't think you would lie, because...
I'm true to my instincts?
Yeah... something like that.

Is that so? Hehe. Then, if that's the case,
I should tell you that what I'm most concerned
with is my hunger...
H-Hey...

I'm only playing. Calm down, Shido-san.
It's alright though. This is kind of why I like you.
Y-You know...
How can I trust you? What are you trying to pull?
My, won't you believe me? How sad.
Are you hiding something?

I was just looking for something. If you're always
this persistent, you'll never get anywhere with
the ladies, Shido-san.

Like that's any of your business! You seriously
won't do something like you did the other day?
Yes. I can promise you that much.
Fine.
Hehe, Shido-san, it's nice that you're so honest.

Sorry for being so simple-minded.
Please don't betray me.
Hehe. Now what should I do?
W-What?!

Well, I'll be off then. Goodbye, Shido-san.
Let's meet again soon.
What is she thinking? I really can't read her.

If she was vengeful at all, I wish she would just
be upfront about it... I don't like this...
